name: Don Quijote
overview: "In a place in La Mancha, whose name I do not want to remember, there has not been a long time lived by a lord of the lance in the shipyard, old pork, skinny rocín and greyhound runner. "INTRODUCTION La Mancha, Spain, April 1605 ... You are Don Alonso Quijano, a nobleman from the 16th century, whose weakness is the novels of cavalry. Everything goes more or less well for your house, until one day your madness reaches the culminating point: you decide to take the arms and go to run adventures by the Mancha. What strange ideas the gentleman has! You get a squire, Sancho Panza, who, although not a big deal, will help you in difficult times. From this moment you will enter the most incredible adventures you can imagine. Sales, hills, forests and inns will witness your wildest ideas such as attacking mills or fighting fierce lions. Your ultimate goal is to get the love of Dulcinea del Toboso, your lady. Although there is a first objective, which is to arm you gentleman, so you can start your adventures. Don Quixote de la Mancha is a conversational graphic adventure that because of its complexity is divided into two parts. You must finish the first part to get a code that will allow you to play in the second part. This adventure consists of a complex system of phrase recognition, and although the basic structure to be typed is VERB x NAME, will also accept and understand sentences separated by punctuation and phrases that include articles, prepositions and adverbs.
